I think the reason this is failing is because other junit tests have failed 
and are leaving some sort of system modal dialog around.

Sonia ran the SWT tests on Windows XP by themsleves 15 times and the failure 
never occured.

Test_org_eclipse_swt_widgets_Shell:
Removing the assertions assuming that shell.forceActive synchronously activate 
the Shell and notify the shellActivated listener when forceActive returns.
